text: Jaba uniharu paigambaramathi avatarita (bha'eko kitabaka kuraharu) sundachan taba timile dekhnechau ki uniharuko amkha amsule bhari'eka lagdachan. Yasakarana ki uniharu satyako pahicana garisake, uniharu bhandachan ‘‘he hamro palanakarta! Hamile imana lyayaum.’’ Atah tapa'im hamra nama pani gavahi dinevalaharuko namasita lekhihalnus
